main.name: Juan Garcia
main.title: Front-End Developer
main.bio: I am a Chicago native who enjoys reading and keeping up to date with web development. See my most recent Pens on Codepen.

about.description: My name is Juan and I'm a Front End Web Developer. I fell in love with code back in college and decided to pursue it as a career. On my spare time I like be active on CodePen while jamming on some Queens of the Stone Age, showcasing my skills and sharing my work with other developers. Having my work seen and liked by people all over the world is my motivation to continue learning.

testimonials.name: Catherine Delcin
testimonials.quote:
I’m very pleased to recommend Juan Garcia as an excellent Web Designer. I’ve gotten to know him as a reliable and enterprising individual with rock star web design skills. I have no doubt that he will create outstanding work as a web designer for you or your company. He has excellent written and verbal communication skills, is extremely organized, can work independently, and is able to effectively multi-task to ensure that all projects are completed in a timely manner.

Juan is fluent in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript and has experience with website builders, like WordPress. Juan has an artistic eye and a keen sense of user experience. He is a creative, detail-oriented, and savvy web designer with a passion for the work that he undertakes. He’s great at working independently and can produce high-level work with little supervision.
